Leni Manaa-Hoppenworth, 48th Ward Alderwoman

Welcome to the website of the 48th ward's alderwoman, Leni Manaa-Hoppenworth.

Find our office information here, check our blog for timely information, and subscribe here for newsletter updates. Not sure if you live in the 48th ward? Check your address here.

Service Requests

Got a service request? Were here to help! Check our Services page for commonly requested ward and city services.

For non-emergency city services, contact 311 by dialing 3-1-1, going to 311.Chicago.gov, or using the CHI 311 app (Apple or Google) on your mobile device.

For health and social services support, contact 211 by dialing 2-1-1 or going to 211metrochicago.org.

Submit Neighborhood Services requests to the 48th ward office here or via the button below.

Submit a 311 Request
Submit a Ward Service Request

Ward Project Requests

In the 48th ward, we use Participatory Budgeting to empower our community members to determine how to spend allocated menu funds for ward infrastructure improvements. Project ideas are generated and voted on by you!

  • Have an idea for a special project? Use this form to share it with our office.

  • Think theres a repair that needs special attention? Use this form to share it with us.

We acknowledge the Kiikaapoi, Peoria, Kaskaskia, Potawatomi, and Myaamia nations on whose land we live and work. We pay respects to their elders past, present, and emerging.

48th Ward Office Info

1129 W Bryn Mawr
Chicago, IL 60660
Phone: 773-784-5277
Email: info@the48thward.org

Office Hours

Mon-Thur: 10am - 5pm
(Weds: Closed from 12-1pm)
Fri: Remote hours 10am-3pm

Closed on Chicago City Holidays
